Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.util.loader

Class DynamicLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.util.loader.DynamicLoader
  • public class DynamicLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    An Enum to load Drawable from the DrawableLruCache.

        Type Parameters:
        V - The type of the callback view.
        P - The type of the callback placeholder.
        R - The type of the callback result.
